objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: The data is passive in nature or not controlled by the defender, so it is hard to identify when an adversary is getting or analyzing the data.
objects.name: Determine 3rd party infrastructure services
objects.description: Infrastructure services includes the hardware, software, and network resources required to operate a communications environment. This infrastructure can be managed by a 3rd party rather than being managed by the owning organization. (Citation: FFIECAwareness) (Citation: Zetter2015Threats)
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Based on what the 3rd party infrastructure is, there are many tell tail signs which indicate it is hosted by a 3rd party, such as ASN data, MX or CNAME pointers or IP addresses

external_references.description: Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council. (2016, October 17). Cybersecurity Awareness. Retrieved March 5, 2017.
Kim Zetter. (2015, January 4). The Biggest Security Threats We’ll Face in 2015. Retrieved March 5, 2017.
